See the License for the ~ specific language governing permissions and limitations ~ under the License.--> <definitions targetNamespace="http://characterise.bitstorage.doms.statsbiblioteket.dk/" name="CharacteriseSoapWebserviceService" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://characterise.bitstorage.doms.statsbiblioteket.dk/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://characterise.bitstorage.doms.statsbiblioteket.dk/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/characteriser/characterise/?xsd=1"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="characterise"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:characterise"/> </message> <message name="characteriseResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:characteriseResponse"/> </message> <message name="FileNotAvailableException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:FileNotAvailableException"/> </message> <message name="CommunicationException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:CommunicationException"/> </message> <message name="ObjectNotFoundException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:ObjectNotFoundException"/> </message> <portType name="CharacteriseSoapWebservice"> <documentation>Java interface the bitstorage system.</documentation> <operation name="characterise"> <documentation>Upload the provided file to the temporary area of bitstorage, giving it the provided file name. Return the MD5 checksum of the file. The file is only uploaded to a temporary approve-area of the bitstorage, and needs to be approved by calling approveFile before it is actually moved to the permanent bitstorage.</documentation> <input message="tns:characterise"/> <output message="tns:characteriseResponse"/> <fault message="tns:FileNotAvailableException" name="FileNotAvailableException"/> <fault message="tns:CommunicationException" name="CommunicationException"/> <fault message="tns:ObjectNotFoundException" name="ObjectNotFoundException"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="CharacteriseSoapWebservicePortBinding" type="tns:CharacteriseSoapWebservice"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="characterise"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="FileNotAvailableException"> <soap:fault name="FileNotAvailableException" use="literal"/> </fault> <fault name="CommunicationException"> <soap:fault name="CommunicationException" use="literal"/> </fault> <fault name="ObjectNotFoundException"> <soap:fault name="ObjectNotFoundException" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="CharacteriseSoapWebserviceService"> <port name="CharacteriseSoapWebservicePort" binding="tns:CharacteriseSoapWebservicePortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/characteriser/characterise/"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

See the License for the ~ specific language governing permissions and limitations ~ under the License.--> <xs:schema version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://characterise.bitstorage.doms.statsbiblioteket.dk/" jaxb:version="1.0" jaxb:extensionBindingPrefixes="xjc" xmlns:tns="http://characterise.bitstorage.doms.statsbiblioteket.dk/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jaxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb" xmlns:xjc="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb/xjc"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <jaxb:globalBindings> <xjc:simple/> </jaxb:globalBindings> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="CommunicationException" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="FileNotAvailableException" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ObjectNotFoundException" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="characteriseResponse" type="tns:characteriseResponse"/> <xs:element name="characterise" type="tns:characterise"/> <xs:element name="pid" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="acceptedFormats" type="xs:anyURI"/> <!--<xs:element name="characterizationOutput" nillable="true" type="xs:base64Binary"/>--> <xs:complexType name="characteriseResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="characterisation" type="tns:characterisation"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="characterisation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="formatURI" type="xs:anyURI" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="bestFormat" type="xs:anyURI"/> <xs:element name="validationStatus" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="identifyServiceDescriptions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="identifyServiceReports" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="validateServiceDescriptions" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="validateServiceReports" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="characterise"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:pid"/> <xs:element ref="tns:acceptedFormats" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
